name: Bustling Little Shop
description:
A small cozy little game to play while on-the-go, taking Japanese dishes into heavy inspiration.

Goals

Serve as many customer as you can in a day and profit as much as posibble!

Don't forget to try discovering as many secret special recipes as possible!

Notes

- Upgrade features are yet to be available as of now... (still on development)

- A day only last from 6 AM - 12 AM

- You can only discard a dish after its been made. Then, drag and drop that dish on the trash bin (bottom right)

How to play:

- Drag and drop  cutlery on the preparation table

- Next drag and drop the ingredients you wish to put on that cutlery

- Lastly click the make button

-  And finally drag and drop your finished-dish to the customer's table (based on the table number (refer to its order))

Credits

All sprites are made by me (HashSythe/Aurelia Catherine)

All sound effects are taken from freesound.org 

Background music is contemplative created by Ayzic

Made for: COMPFEST 14
